mapper.select: SELECT ow.offline_warehouse_id, ow.store_id, ow.shoes_id, ow.quantity, s.shoes_name, s.shoes_price, s.size, s.shoes_type_id, s.brand_id, st.shoes_type, b.brand_name FROM tbl_offline_warehouse ow JOIN tbl_shoes s ON ow.shoes_id = s.shoes_id JOIN tbl_shoes_type st ON s.shoes_type_id = st.shoes_type_id JOIN tbl_brand b ON s.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE ow.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY ow.offline_warehouse_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT offline_warehouse_id , store_id , shoes_id , quantity FROM tbl_offline_warehouse WHERE offline_warehouse_id = #{offlineWarehouseId}
